content: Guys I was just casually walking around in the pits of hell and I saw BTS there. Of course I didn’t mean to bump into them I just casually saw them talking to Satan! Please don’t stalk them or try and see them too I won’t disclose their location :((
she wasn’t even discreet about it like she knew that they were there and went out with the purpose of finding them
She literally stalked them and tried to play it off. I’m laughing so hard rn
Omg I saw them too, the loch ness monster was with them and Satan. me and my good friend nessy saw them but kept a distance. They made hell hotter than it already was wheew
Really? I saw a fire breathing dragon there it was so scary,. Make sure not to tell other people we don’t want other fans following them!
Omg yes I taped nessy's mouth shut uwu. I'm almost convinced vantaekim was under that satan costume and will leak everything tho
She didn’t even tryto seem legit I have to scream
the fact that she tried so hard to act like she saw them by accident and just happened to be carrying around her letters "just in case" I CANT BREATHE. stalking but she called it a happy coincidence.
and then she totally disclosed on what tiny a-s island they were on....
